#Text= Aye - aye spirit says : " Stinky ?

column1: #Text=You came back .
#Text=" Wan says : " It 's good to see you again .
#Text=" Aye - aye spirit says : " You and Raava are just in time to help us clear these tree - killing fire - lovers out of here just like the old days .
#Text=" Jaya says : " You are the one who 's getting cleared out .
#Text=" Wan says : " There 's no need for violence .
#Text=I know there must be a way to work out a compromise .
#Text=" Aye - aye spirit says : " You have a good heart , Stinky .
#Text=But these fire tossers are n't like you .
#Text=" Jaya says : " Spirits like him killed our friends !
#Text=I ca n't let them get away with that .
#Text=" Dark aye - aye spirit says : " We are protectors of the forest .
#Text=We wo n't let you burn it down .
#Text=" Raava says : " It 's Vaatu .
#Text=He 's growing stronger , using their anger to turn them to his side .
#Text=" Dark aye - aye spirit says : " Wipe them out !
#Text=" Wan says : " Stop , please !
#Text=Raava , we need to combine our energies .
#Text=Maybe then we 'll have enough power to stop this .
#Text=Enough !
#Text=You need to stop fighting now , before you destroy each other !
#Text=" Aye - aye spirit says : " Stinky , w - what happened ?
#Text=" Jaya says : " He 's controlling all four elements .
#Text=" Raava says : " Wan , I have to leave your body , or I 'll destroy you .
#Text=" Wan says : " No .
#Text=It 's working .
#Text=If you leave , the fighting will start again .
#Text=" Raava says : " Wan !
#Text=" Wan says : " We have to go back .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " Do n't bother .
#Text=Your human friends have already been annihilated .
#Text=" Wan says : " No !
#Text=" Vaatu says : " Enjoy your final days .
#Text=See you at the end of the world !
#Text=" Wan says : " Raava ... " Raava says : " I 'm sorry , Wan .
#Text=" Raava says : " We 're almost there .
#Text=I was wrong about you , Wan .
#Text=I had no idea that humans were capable of such nobility and courage .
#Text=I 'm sorry that we do not have much more time together .
#Text=" Wan says : " Let 's not give up before the battle 's even begun .
#Text=Who knows what will happen ?
#Text=After all , this is my first Harmonic Convergence .
#Text=" Raava says : " This is the southern portal to the Spirit World .
#Text=Here , Vaatu and I will do battle once again , at the place where the two worlds meet .
#Text="
